writer.name: 凯·克里斯蒂安森 Kai Christiansen

director.name: 凯·克里斯蒂安森 Kai Christiansen

introduction: The violent murder of an Egyptian pharaoh, the inexplicable disappearance of two young princes, or the questionable suicide of a troubled artist – the futuristic series Cold Case reopens the darkest chapters of history. Using modern forensic science techniques and criminalistics, we revisit infamous cold cases such as Ramses III, King Richard and the two Princes, and Vincent Van Gogh.Renowned Black Panther actor Florence Kasumba guides the audience through six unsolved cases, supported by CI experts. 360° virtual imaging places the viewer at the scene of the crime, with film noir aesthetics and chilling documentary sections turning history into a thriller. Accompany Florence as she examines evidence and witness statements, separates fact from fiction, and develops new theories about what really happened.Episode 1 - Conspiracy in the Harem - The Case Of Ramses IIIEpisode 2 - A Shot In A Starry Night – The Case Of Vincent Van GoghEpisode 3 - Death Of An Icon – Marilyn MonroeEpisode 4 - The Dagger In The Cathedral Of Florence – The Medici CaseEpisode 5 - Death In The Tower - King Richard And The Two PrincesEpisode 6 - Death of a Luxury Call Girl - Rosemarie NitribittNarrator: Hansi JochmannProduced by Story House Productions in association with ZDF, Arte and ZDF Enterprises
